beer.name: Black Butte Porter
beer.description: Towering high above Central Oregon, jetting into clear blue skies, Black Butte can be seen for miles. From its base flows the legendary Metolius River--with its source hidden deep beneath ancient lava flows. â¨â¨Black Butte Porter, crafted from chocolate and crystal malts, is Deschutes Breweryâs flagship brand. With a rich and distinctive flavor, this porter has enjoyed a loyal and passionate following since its first pint in 1991
